verses.text: Let \w us|strong="G5399"\w* \w therefore|strong="G3767"\w* \w fear|strong="G5399"\w*, \w lest|strong="G3379"\w*, a \w promise|strong="G1860"\w* being \w left|strong="G2641"\w* \add us\add* of \w entering|strong="G1525"\w* \w into|strong="G1519"\w* \w his|strong="G0846"\w* \w rest|strong="G2663"\w*, \w any|strong="G5100"\w* \w of|strong="G1537"\w* \w you|strong="G5216"\w* should \w seem|strong="G1380"\w* to come short of \w it|strong="G5302"\w*.

\w For|strong="G1063"\w* \w unto|strong="G2097"\w* us \w was|strong="G2070"\w* the gospel \w preached|strong="G2097"\w*, as well \w as|strong="G2509"\w* unto \w them|strong="G2548"\w*: \w but|strong="G0235"\w* the \w word|strong="G3056"\w* \w preached|strong="G0189"\w* \w did|strong="G5623"\w* \w not|strong="G3756"\w* \w profit|strong="G5623"\w* \w them|strong="G1565"\w*, \w not|strong="G3361"\w* being mixed \w with|strong="G4786"\w* \w faith|strong="G4102"\w* in them that \w heard|strong="G0191"\w* \add it\add*.

\w For|strong="G1063"\w* \w we|strong="G1525"\w* which have \w believed|strong="G4100"\w* do \w enter|strong="G1525"\w* \w into|strong="G1519"\w* \w rest|strong="G2663"\w*, \w as|strong="G2531"\w* he \w said|strong="G2046"\w*, \w As|strong="G5613"\w* I have \w sworn|strong="G3660"\w* \w in|strong="G1722"\w* \w my|strong="G3450"\w* \w wrath|strong="G3709"\w*, \w if|strong="G1487"\w* they shall \w enter|strong="G1525"\w* \w into|strong="G1519"\w* \w my|strong="G3450"\w* \w rest|strong="G2663"\w*: \w although|strong="G2543"\w* the \w works|strong="G2041"\w* were \w finished|strong="G1096"\w* \w from|strong="G0575"\w* the \w foundation|strong="G2602"\w* of the \w world|strong="G2889"\w*.

\w For|strong="G1063"\w* he \w spake|strong="G2046"\w* in a certain \w place|strong="G4225"\w* \w of|strong="G4012"\w* the \w seventh|strong="G1442"\w* \add day\add* on this \w wise|strong="G3779"\w*, \w And|strong="G2532"\w* \w God|strong="G2316"\w* did \w rest|strong="G2664"\w* \w the|strong="G2250"\w* \w seventh|strong="G1442"\w* \w day|strong="G2250"\w* \w from|strong="G0575"\w* \w all|strong="G3956"\w* \w his|strong="G0846"\w* \w works|strong="G2041"\w*.

\w And|strong="G2532"\w* \w in|strong="G1722"\w* \w this|strong="G5129"\w* \add place\add* \w again|strong="G3825"\w*, \w If|strong="G1487"\w* they shall \w enter|strong="G1525"\w* \w into|strong="G1519"\w* \w my|strong="G3450"\w* \w rest|strong="G2663"\w*.

\w Seeing|strong="G1893"\w* \w therefore|strong="G3767"\w* it \w remaineth|strong="G0620"\w* that \w some|strong="G5100"\w* must \w enter|strong="G1525"\w* \w there|strong="G0846"\w*\w in|strong="G1519"\w*, \w and|strong="G2532"\w* they to whom it \w was|strong="G2097"\w* \w first|strong="G4386"\w* \w preached|strong="G2097"\w* \w entered|strong="G1525"\w* \w not|strong="G3756"\w* \w in|strong="G1525"\w* because \w of|strong="G1223"\w* \w unbelief|strong="G0543"\w*:

\w Again|strong="G3825"\w*, he \w limiteth|strong="G3724"\w* a \w certain|strong="G5100"\w* \w day|strong="G2250"\w*, \w saying|strong="G3004"\w* \w in|strong="G1722"\w* \w David|strong="G1138"\w*, To \w day|strong="G4594"\w*, \w after|strong="G3326"\w* so \w long|strong="G5118"\w* a \w time|strong="G5550"\w*; \w as|strong="G2531"\w* it is \w said|strong="G2046"\w*, To \w day|strong="G4594"\w* \w if|strong="G1437"\w* ye will \w hear|strong="G0191"\w* \w his|strong="G0846"\w* \w voice|strong="G5456"\w*, \w harden|strong="G4645"\w* \w not|strong="G3361"\w* \w your|strong="G5216"\w* \w hearts|strong="G2588"\w*.

\w For|strong="G1063"\w* \w if|strong="G1487"\w* \w Jesus|strong="G2424"\w* had \w given|strong="G2664"\w* \w them|strong="G0846"\w* \w rest|strong="G2664"\w*, \w then|strong="G0302"\w* would \w he|strong="G2980"\w* \w not|strong="G3756"\w* \w afterward|strong="G3326"\w* have \w spoken|strong="G2980"\w* \w of|strong="G4012"\w* \w another|strong="G0243"\w* \w day|strong="G2250"\w*.
There \w remaineth|strong="G0620"\w* \w therefore|strong="G0686"\w* a \w rest|strong="G4520"\w* to the \w people|strong="G2992"\w* of \w God|strong="G2316"\w*.

\w For|strong="G1063"\w* he that is \w entered|strong="G1525"\w* \w into|strong="G1519"\w* \w his|strong="G0846"\w* \w rest|strong="G2663"\w*, \w he|strong="G0846"\w* \w also|strong="G2532"\w* hath \w ceased|strong="G2664"\w* \w from|strong="G0575"\w* his \w own|strong="G2398"\w* \w works|strong="G2041"\w*, \w as|strong="G5618"\w* \w God|strong="G2316"\w* \add did\add* \w from|strong="G0575"\w* \w his|strong="G0846"\w*.

Let us \w labour|strong="G4704"\w* \w therefore|strong="G3767"\w* to \w enter|strong="G1525"\w* \w into|strong="G1519"\w* \w that|strong="G1565"\w* \w rest|strong="G2663"\w*, \w lest|strong="G3361"\w* any \w man|strong="G5100"\w* \w fall|strong="G4098"\w* \w after|strong="G1722"\w* the \w same|strong="G0846"\w* \w example|strong="G5262"\w* of \w unbelief|strong="G0543"\w*.

\w For|strong="G1063"\w* the \w word|strong="G3056"\w* of \w God|strong="G2316"\w* \add is\add* \w quick|strong="G2198"\w*, \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w powerful|strong="G1756"\w*, \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w sharper|strong="G5114"\w* \w than|strong="G5228"\w* \w any|strong="G3956"\w* \w twoedged|strong="G1366"\w* \w sword|strong="G3162"\w*, \w piercing|strong="G1338"\w* \w even|strong="G2532"\w* \w to|strong="G0891"\w* the dividing \w asunder|strong="G3311"\w* of \w soul|strong="G5590"\w* \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w spirit|strong="G4151"\w*, \w and|strong="G5037"\w* of the \w joints|strong="G0719"\w* \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w marrow|strong="G3452"\w*, \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \add is\add* a \w discerner|strong="G2924"\w* of the \w thoughts|strong="G1761"\w* \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w intents|strong="G1771"\w* of the \w heart|strong="G2588"\w*.

\w Neither|strong="G3756"\w* is \w there|strong="G2076"\w* any \w creature|strong="G2937"\w* that is not \w manifest|strong="G0852"\w* \w in|strong="G1799"\w* \w his|strong="G0846"\w* \w sight|strong="G1799"\w*: \w but|strong="G1161"\w* all \w things|strong="G3956"\w* \add are\add* \w naked|strong="G1131"\w* \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w opened|strong="G5136"\w* unto the \w eyes|strong="G3788"\w* of \w him|strong="G0846"\w* \w with|strong="G4314"\w* \w whom|strong="G3739"\w* we \w have|strong="G2254"\w* to \w do|strong="G3056"\w*.

Seeing \w then|strong="G3767"\w* that we \w have|strong="G2192"\w* \w a|strong="G0749"\w* \w great|strong="G3173"\w* high \w priest|strong="G0749"\w*, that is passed \w into|strong="G1330"\w* the \w heavens|strong="G3772"\w*, \w Jesus|strong="G2424"\w* the \w Son|strong="G5207"\w* of \w God|strong="G2316"\w*, let us hold \w fast|strong="G2902"\w* \add our\add* \w profession|strong="G3671"\w*.

\w For|strong="G1063"\w* we \w have|strong="G2192"\w* \w not|strong="G3756"\w* an high priest \w which|strong="G0749"\w* \w can|strong="G1410"\w*\w not|strong="G3361"\w* be touched with the feeling \w of|strong="G4834"\w* \w our|strong="G2257"\w* \w infirmities|strong="G0769"\w*; \w but|strong="G1161"\w* \w was|strong="G3985"\w* \w in|strong="G2596"\w* all \w points|strong="G3956"\w* \w tempted|strong="G3985"\w* like \w as|strong="G3665"\w* \add we are, yet\add* \w without|strong="G5565"\w* \w sin|strong="G0266"\w*.

Let \w us|strong="G4334"\w* \w therefore|strong="G3767"\w* \w come|strong="G4334"\w* \w bold|strong="G3954"\w*\w ly|strong="G3326"\w* unto the \w throne|strong="G2362"\w* of \w grace|strong="G5485"\w*, \w that|strong="G2443"\w* we may \w obtain|strong="G2983"\w* \w mercy|strong="G1656"\w*, \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w find|strong="G2147"\w* \w grace|strong="G5485"\w* \w to|strong="G1519"\w* \w help|strong="G0996"\w* in time of \w need|strong="G2121"\w*.
